layout: post

categories: {", ".join(categories)}
---

# {title}
###{authors}
##### {date}
##### {", ".join(categories)}  
##### {pdflink}
### Abstract:
{abstract}

### Bibtex:
```
{bibtex}
```

---

# My reading



"""
